common.core

Class ImageSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.core.Sprite
      • common.core.ImageSprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, NoMoneySprite, Tile

    public abstract class ImageSprite
extends Sprite
    This class creates image sprite and extends the Sprite class The class is also responsible for checking if collision occurs with the image
